title: Arsenal 0 West Ham 2: Arsenal flatline as anxiety grips the Emirates - The Mail
text: THIS was supposed to be the Christmas that saw Arsenal put the squeeze on Manchester City, a time to put clear air between themselves and Pep Guardiola’s team while the Premier League champions were away in the Middle East. author: Hunter Crowther
title: Viktor Arvidsson to return to Oilers lineup Thursday after 15-game absence
text:
Viktor Arvidsson to return to Oilers lineup Thursday after 15-game absence
Edmonton Oilers’ forward Viktor Arvidsson will return to the lineup Thursday night when the Oilers face the [Boston Bruins](/teams/boston-bruins/line-combinations).
The @EdmontonOilers morning skate:
RNH-McDavid-Hyman
Podkolzin-Draisaitl-Kapanen
Arvidsson-Henrique-Brown
J. Skinner-Janmark-Perry
Ryan
Ekholm-Bouchard
Nurse-Stecher
Kulak-Emberson
S. Skinner
— Bob Stauffer (@Bob_Stauffer) December 19, 2024
At Oilers’ practice on Thursday, Arvidsson was skating on a line with Adam Henrique and Connor Brown. The winger [was placed on Injured Reserve ](/news/oilers-place-viktor-arvidsson-on-injured-reserve)(IR) Nov. 21 and has been out of the lineup since Nov. 12, when he suffered an injury against the [New York Islanders](/teams/new-york-islanders/line-combinations).
He was expected to return much earlier, but the issues have continued to persist, so the Oilers have retroactively placed him on IR to create more roster space since he’s now been out for a long enough period of time.
[Weeks later on Dec. 5](/news/no-timeline-for-return-for-oilers-viktor-arvidsson), Head Coach Kris Knoblauch said his injury “hasn’t quite healed the way we assumed it would,” and that there was no timeline for his return.
Through 16 regular-season games, Arvidsson has two goals and three assists for five points. He joined the Oilers in the offseason, [signing a two-year deal](/news/edmonton-oilers-sign-viktor-arvidsson-to-two-year-contract-at-4-million-aav) worth $4 million per season.
The 31-year-old is coming off a 2023-24 campaign with the [Los Angeles Kings](/teams/los-angeles-kings/line-combinations) where he only played 18 games due to a back surgery, scoring six goals and nine assists for 15 points.
In 11 NHL seasons, Arvidsson has 181 goals and 186 assists for 367 points in 562 career regular-season games with the Oilers, Kings and [Nashville Predators](/teams/nashville-predators/line-combinations). Drafted as a 21-year-old in the fourth round by the Predators in the 2014 NHL Entry Draft, he immediately joined Nashville’s AHL affiliate, the Milwaukee Admirals, scoring 22 goals and adding 33 assists for 55 points in 70 regular-season games.
Going into Thursday’s game, the Oilers are 18-11-2 with 38 points, third in the Pacific Division.

author: lefigaro.fr
title: Nantes : suspecté de 70 cambriolages, un homme arrêté... un mois après avoir été condamné à de la prison ferme
text:
Nantes : suspecté de 70 cambriolages, un homme arrêté... un mois après avoir été condamné à de la prison ferme Par S.C. Publié il y a 10 heures , Mis à jour il y a 2 heures Lire dans l’app Copier le lien Lien copié Mail Facebook Twitter Linkedin Messenger WhatsApp Cambrioleur multirécidiviste, un trentenaire avait écopé, début juillet, de six mois d’emprisonnement, sans mandat de dépôt, pour s’être retranché avec une arme au domicile de son ancienne compagne. Il sera de nouveau jugé en septembre avec son complice.
Le Figaro Nantes
Un retour express au tribunal correctionnel de Nantes . Un homme de 33 ans et son complice de 29 ans ont été interpellés le 5 août, dans le cadre d’une enquête de gendarmerie ouverte autour d’une série de cambriolages relevés ces derniers mois autour de l’agglomération nantaise . Le duo est suspecté d’avoir visité au moins 73 logements à Couëron, Héric, Indre et Vigneux-de-Bretagne. Les deux individus sont bien connus de la justice, chacun ayant plus de 10 condamnations pour cambriolages à son casier judiciaire. Mais il y a mieux : le trentenaire venait d’être condamné à six mois de prison ferme, pour s’être retranché, fin juin, au domicile de son ex-compagne, avec une arme, avant de se rendre après intervention du GIGN .
Jugé le 2 juillet en comparution immédiate, le trentenaire, un livreur installé à Couëron, avait écopé d’une peine de douze mois d’emprisonnement, dont six assortis d’un sursis probatoire. Ses six mois de prison ferme n’ont en revanche pas été associés à un mandat de dépôt, laissant la porte ouverte à un aménagement de peine. La justice lui a en outre imposé une obligation de soins, notamment pour réduire sa consommation d’alcool et de cocaïne . Sorti libre, l’individu pouvait ainsi s’en retourner à ses cambriolages.
Une appétence pour McDonald’s Selon les éléments de l’enquête menée par les gendarmes de la brigade de recherches de Nantes ainsi que par les experts du groupe d’investigation sur les phénomènes sériels, le livreur et son compère, sans emploi, se livraient à cette série de vols depuis au moins janvier. Leur rythme avait accéléré pendant les vacances, avec un mode opératoire bien rodé et jusqu’à six vols par nuit - rapportent nos confrères de Presse Océan . Le binôme choisissait des résidences aux volets fermés dont le courrier s’accumulait dans les boîtes aux lettres. Il pénétrait par effraction, de préférence à l’arrière des maisons. Et leurs méfaits accomplis, ils terminaient leur tournée par un rituel qui leur tenait à cœur : un casse-croûte chez McDonald’s .
Les deux hommes auraient confirmé au moins la moitié des 73 cambriolages qui leur sont imputés dans le département, jusqu’à leur dernier vol recensé, le 26 juillet. Le duo sera jugé au tribunal correctionnel de Nantes le 23 septembre. Le trentenaire connaît déjà bien le palais de justice. Sa première condamnation remonte à 2009.

author: Diario Deportivo Olé
title: Video: el error de Félix Torres que le costó un gol a Corinthians cuando iba un minuto de juego :: Olé Ecuador
text: ¡Un fallo de [Félix Torres](https://www.ole.com.ar/tema/felix-torres.html) le costó un gol al [Corinthians ](https://www.ole.com.ar/tema/corinthians.html)cuando iba menos de un minuto! El defensor de la [Selección de Ecuador](https://www.ole.com.ar/tema/seleccion-de-ecuador.html) perdió en la marca, tuvo una floja reacción y salió en la foto del 1-0 de Gremio ante el Timao, por la fecha 19 del Brasileirao. Iba poco más de un minuto de juego en el Arena Corinthians, cuando el tricolor no reaccionó a tiempo. El venezolano Yeferson Soteldo sacó un centro al corazón del área local y Félix no llegó a despejar: el defensor Rodrigo Ely se elevó más e impactó la pelota con la cabeza para poner en ventaja a los visitantes. El ex Barcelona viene también de salir en la foto de un gol muy doloroso para La Tri. [Tuvo un mal cierre contra Argentina](https://www.ole.com.ar/ecuador/la-tri/seleccion-argentina-error-ecuador-tri-partido-copa-america-felix-torres-marca_0_fdZd314YSK.html), en una jugada que terminó en gol de Lisandro Martínez. Aunque Ecuador terminó empatando agónicamente ese cotejo en Houston, fue eliminado en la tanda de penales y se despidió de la Copa América en cuartos de final. En los últimos días, Torres había sido noticia p [or haber visitado a la concentración de Barcelona en Sao Paulo](https://www.ole.com.ar/ecuador/barcelona-sc/visita-lujo-barcelona-jugador-seleccion-ecuador-brasil_0_XGiv2NBd1K.html). El zaguero aprovechó que su ex equipo viajó a Brasil para enfrentar a Red Bull Bragantino y aprovechó para acercarse al hotel donde estaban Ariel Holan y compañía. El error de Félix Torres Félix Torres -

author: HELLFIRE
title: Kids' shoemaker Start-Rite trips over security again, spilling CC info - Security | DSLReports Forums
text: » www.theregister.com/2024 ··· _breach/ quote: Children's shoemaker Start-Rite is dealing with a nasty "security incident" involving customer payment card details, its second significant lapse during the past eight years. That's according to a recent notification sent to customers, seen by The Register, which didn't clarify exactly what the nature of that trouble was, although we know it involved the website's payment page. The intrusion occurred between October 14 and November 7, the notification reads, and the information understood to be potentially compromised includes customer names as displayed on their payment cards, the address to which the card is registered, the card number, its expiry date, and card verification value (CVV). ... Start-Rite confirmed the attack to The Register, however, it has yet to publicly acknowledge the event on its website, social media, or other online presences. It said in a statement: "On 11 November, Start-Rite Shoes became aware that it had suffered a security incident via a third-party application code on www.startriteshoes.com. The breach potentially provided access to customer bank card information. The website is now secure and the malicious code and third-party app have been removed. ... The recent attack at the Norwich-based shoemaker appears to be more serious than the last one we covered back in 2016. ...

author: Wendy Osher
title: Guy Fieri Foundation donates $1.2M to Lahaina restaurant workers impacted by wildfires
text: Guy Fieri Foundation donates $1.2M to Lahaina restaurant workers impacted by wildfires Celebrated chef and TV personality Guy Fieri teamed up with the [Hawaiʻi Restaurant Association](https://hawaiirestaurant.org/), [American Savings Bank](https://www.asbhawaii.com/) and [Fiserv](https://www.fiserv.com/en.html), Inc., to distribute $600 prepaid debit cards to Lahaina restaurant workers who lost their job when their workplace was destroyed in the tragic wildfires on Aug. 8. With many residents still struggling to purchase everyday essentials, such as food and medication, this gift provides much-needed assistance to Lahaina restaurant workers who have lost so much. The HRA has spent the last few weeks reaching out to affected Lahaina restaurant owners whose businesses were destroyed by the fire. So far, HRA has been in contact with about 70 restaurant owners, who are scheduled to pick up the cards for their employees at ASB’s Kahului Branch through the end of the week. Lahaina restaurant owners who have not yet been in contact with the HRA should email [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection) or call 808-944-9105 for more information on the prepaid debit card program and next steps. Restaurant owners must contact the HRA before picking up their employees’ cards. As a chef and foodie, Fieri has established a special connection with Maui and has showcased many of the island’s restaurants on his various television shows. Fieri has dedicated his life to supporting the culinary industry, and when he heard about the devastation from the fires on Maui restaurant workers, he sprang into action. Fieri organized “ [Chefs for Maui](https://guyfierifoundation.ejoinme.org/chefsformaui),” a dinner in Sonoma, California, which drew support from 38 award-winning chefs, celebrity friends, foodies and world-renowned restauranteurs. The sold-out event raised over $1.5 million, which was donated to the HRA and Salvation Army Hawaiʻi. A portion of those proceeds went toward purchasing these prepaid debit cards for Maui restaurant workers. “Hawaiʻi Restaurant Association is pleased to partner with the Guy Fieri Foundation, American Savings Bank and Fiserv to provide this support to workers employed at the restaurants destroyed in the Lahaina wildfires,” said Sheryl Matsuoka, executive director at HRA. “As we worked over the last several months to contact those affected, we heard many stories of heartbreak, tragedy and loss. Yet, we also heard stories of hope and resilience.” “We are honored to collaborate with the Guy Fieri Foundation, as well as American Savings Bank and Fiserv, in this meaningful endeavor to, once again, support our foodservice community,” said Matsuoka. To ensure donations from the Guy Fieri Foundation directly benefit impacted restaurant workers, ASB and Fiserv waived all fees related to the production, distribution and management of the cards. “American Savings Bank is committed to supporting the individuals, families and businesses on Maui as the community heals and rebuilds in the aftermath of the devastating wildfires,” said Ann Teranishi, president and CEO at American Savings Bank. “We hope the generosity demonstrated by the Guy Fieri Foundation will inspire others to join in and support the Maui community.” “We’re proud to help bring to life initiatives that benefit small businesses, their workers, and the communities they serve,” said Jose Garcia, senior vice president at Fiserv. “The need for everyday essentials never stops, and with a fee-free prepaid card, people will have a convenient way to access these donations to make day-to-day purchases.” Sponsored Content Comments [View Comments](#)

title: 云南砚山：无人机科技破解"用工荒"-新华网
text:
七月，在云南省文山壮族苗族自治州砚山县盘龙彝族乡的层层山峦间，漫山遍野的烟田绿意盎然。与往年不同，烟农梁绍昌不再担心烟叶无法及时运出。通过无人机运输技术，烟叶综合运输成本显著下降，科技的力量实实在在地转化为烟农的效益。
无人机吊着一捆新鲜烟叶穿梭在山林间（7月18日摄）。
  盘龙乡山高坡陡，过去每到采收季，梁绍昌都要费尽心思四处张罗人手，效率低下，工钱也水涨船高。在砚山县盘龙烟站组织的一场科技培训会上。梁绍昌被屏幕上无人机高效穿梭于山地运送物资的画面触动。
  在烟站生产技术人员的指导下，梁绍昌引进了专门用于山地物资运输的无人机。飞行路线的设定、起降点的选择、烟叶的合理捆扎固定，每一个环节反复摸索和调试，一次次现场试飞，一遍遍优化方案，无人机逐渐成了烟田上空灵动的“搬运工”。
  今年夏天，梁绍昌的烟叶随着一架无人机轻盈地掠过树梢，沿着预设的安全航线，精准地悬停在山坡下收集点上方，地面人员麻利地将一捆捆采摘下的新鲜烟叶从吊索上放到收集点的皮卡车上，几分钟就完成了以往需要壮劳力辛苦跋涉大半天的任务。此外，无人机运输极大降低了烟叶在崎岖山路颠簸中造成的损伤，保证了入烤烟叶的品质，间接提升了最终收益。
地面人员准备卸下无人机吊运过来的烟叶（7月18日摄）。
  梁绍昌的成功实践，让邻近的烟农纷纷前来观摩取经。与此同时，砚山县盘龙烟叶工作站组织现场演示会，推广“无人机运烟”这一新模式，并着手探索建立共享服务平台，降低单个农户使用新技术的门槛，解决山区农业生产“最后一公里”运输难题。（完）
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->computing and information technology

author: Sean I. Mills | Staff writer | SMills@RNYmedia.com
title: 15-20 inches of snow expected through the weekend | News | romesentinel.com
text:
ROME — More than a foot of lake effect snow is expected to fall on the Mohawk Valley over the next several days due to persistent snowfall through Sunday, according to the National Weather Service in Binghamton.
"The one thing that will happen is that it will just keep snowing," said meteorologist Jake Chalupsky Thursday morning. "We have a pretty intense lake effect snow event occurring right now."

author: Carles Planas Bou
title: OpenAI planea crear un navegador web con IA para competir con Google
text:
Semana de malas noticias para Google . Si el miércoles supo que el Departamento de Justicia de Estados Unidos quiere obligarla a vender el negocio de Chrome para acabar con su monopolio , el jueves se filtró que OpenAI , su rival y fabricante de ChatGPT , estudia la posibilidad de desarrollar un navegador web propio para desbancarla.
Según publica The Information, la start-up de inteligencia artificial financiada por Microsoft se plantea crear un producto de navegación por Internet que combinaría con su chatbot, si bien esa posibilidad está aún lejos de materializarse.
Con este movimiento, OpenAI podría tratar de plantar cara a Google. Chrome es el navegador más popular del mundo, pues concentra un 67% de ese mercado, según datos de Statcounter, muy por delante de rivales como Safari , Edge o Firefox . Competir con Google es una misión titánica, pero eso podría cambiar si la justicia estadounidense termina obligando a la compañía a desprenderse de su navegador.
Ambas noticias han hecho que la capitalización de Google se resienta en bolsa . En las últimas 24 horas, sus acciones se han devaluado un 4,56%.
Buscador contra Google No es la primera vez que OpenAI reta a Google. A finales de julio, la empresa capitaneada por Sam Altman anunció el lanzamiento de SearchGPT , el prototipo de un motor de búsqueda que se sirve de IA para dar respuesta a las consultas de los usuarios. Un año antes, Microsoft integró esa tecnología en su buscador Bing y en su navegador Edge a través de Copilot , un asistente conversacional que acompaña al usuario durante la navegación web.
El dominio de Google en ese campo es aún más abrumador, pues su servicio concentra casi el 90% del mercado mundial de las búsquedas web. Aun así, las maniobras de Microsoft y OpenAI han obligado a Google a mover ficha. A finales de 2023, el gigante tecnológico dirigido por Sundar Pichai lanzó su propio modelo de IA, Gemini , y lo integró a sus servicios para tratar de mejorar las búsquedas y neutralizar a sus rivales.
OpenAI también está buscando otras fórmulas para ganar terreno a Google. Según The Information, la firma está estudiando la posibilidad de potenciar las funciones de IA en los móviles y tabletas fabricados por la surcoreana Samsung , tradicional socio comercial de Google. En junio, la creadora de ChatGPT anunció una nueva alianza para alimentar los dispositivos de Apple , que cobra unos 12.000 millones de dólares anuales de Google para que su navegador y su buscador estén instalados por defecto.
